import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getTopTracks}from'../utils/spotify';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=()=>{const[tracks,setTracks]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTracks=async()=>{const topTracks=await getTopTracks();setTracks(topTracks);};fetchTracks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-y-auto h-[600px]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-200",children:"Cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-200",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-200",children:"Artists"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border-b-2 border-gray-200",children:"Popularity"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:tracks.map((track,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-b border-gray-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:track.track.album.images[0].url,alt:track.track.name,className:"w-12 h-12 object-cover rounded"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2",children:track.track.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2",children:track.track.artists.map(artist=>artist.name).join(', ')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"px-4 py-2",children:[track.track.popularity,"%"]})," "]},index))})]})})});};export default Card;
